code: import axios from'axios';export var getItems=function getItems(){return axios.get('/api/items/');};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return axios.post('/api/items/',item);};export var updateItem=function updateItem(itemId,item){return axios.put("/api/items/".concat(itemId,"/"),item);};export var deleteItem=function deleteItem(itemId){return axios.delete("/api/items/".concat(itemId,"/"));};
